products.title: Devon Sand Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Devon Sand Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £15.13 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, our Devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Sand will introduce a stylish, earthy shade into your interiors. A fabulously warm grey/brown hue.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2244 Fabric Colour: Sandstone Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Devon Sand
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Devon Sand Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
